      Dark mode

      React Data Grid Third-party licenses

      Learn about the licensing terms of Handsontable's software dependencies.

      In this article
      • Open-source software components
        • Dependencies of the Formulas plugin

      Open-source software components

      • numbro.js (handles numeric data)
        Author: Benjamin Van Ryseghem
        License: Open source (MIT)
        http://numbrojs.com/ (opens new window)

      • Pikaday (displays a date picker)
        Author: David Bushell
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/dbushell/Pikaday (opens new window)

      • moment.js (parses, validates and displays dates)
        Author: Tim Wood, Tskren Chernev, Moment.js contributors
        License: Open source (MIT)
        http://momentjs.com (opens new window)

      • core-js (polyfills for ECMAScript 5, ECMAScript 6, promises, symbols, collections)
        Author: Denis Pushkarev
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/zloirock/core-js (opens new window)

      • javascript-algorithms (implementation of linked list and merge sort)
        Author: Minko Gechev
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/mgechev/javascript-algorithms (opens new window)

      • DOMPurify (an XSS sanitizer for HTML)
        Author: Mario Heiderich
        License: Open source (Apache 2.0)
        https://github.com/cure53/DOMPurify (opens new window)

      Dependencies of the Formulas plugin

      The dependencies below apply only if you use the Formulas calculation plugin:

      • bessel
        Author: SheetJS
        License: Apache v2.0
        https://github.com/SheetJS/bessel (opens new window)

      • Chevrotain
        Author: SAP SE or an SAP affiliate company
        License: Apache v2.0
        https://github.com/SAP/chevrotain (opens new window)

      • core-js
        Author: Denis Pushkarev
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/zloirock/core-js (opens new window)

      • jStat
        Author: jStat
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/jstat/jstat (opens new window)

      • tiny-emitter
        Author: Scott Corgan
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/scottcorgan/tiny-emitter (opens new window)

      • unorm
        Author: Matsuza, Bjarke Walling
        License: Open source (MIT)
        https://github.com/walling/unorm (opens new window)
